goal:
Czech Publishers´ Association (CPA) is a professional association of magazine and newspaper publihers in the Czech Republic. Mambers of the association are the most important Czech publihers of the periodical press. CPA is focused on a maintenance of press freedom and business independence. CPA promotes qualities of the periodical press as a advetising medium and a positive of an influence af reading press for all age groups of population namely children and teenagers.
CPA organises a national wide „one currency“ readership survey Media projekt and some specialised surveys of the magazine and newspaper markets in the Czech Republic.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Culture, Education, Information Society, Taxation
euInitiatives: VAT, copyright for publishers, protection of the personal data, audio visual media services, advertising regulation
